Name: Amoxicillin
Description: Antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections such as pneumonia bronchitis and infections of the ear nose throat skin or urinary tract

Name: Albuterol
Description: Bronchodilator used to treat asthma chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) and other breathing problems

Name: Diazepam
Description: Benzodiazepine used to treat anxiety disorders alcohol withdrawal muscle spasms and seizures

Name: Ciprofloxacin
Description: Fluoroquinolone antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections such as urinary tract infections respiratory infections skin infections and bone/joint infections

Name: Prednisone
Description: Corticosteroid used to treat inflammatory conditions such as arthritis asthma skin conditions and allergic disorders

Name: Metronidazole
Description: Nitroimidazole antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections protozoal infections and infections of the vagina stomach skin joints and respiratory tract

Name: Azithromycin
Description: Macrolide antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections such as respiratory infections skin infections ear infections and sexually transmitted infections

Name: Warfarin
Description: Oral anticoagulant used to prevent blood clots in conditions such as atrial fibrillation deep vein thrombosis (DVT) and pulmonary embolism

Name: Clopidogrel
Description: Antiplatelet medication used to reduce the risk of heart attack and stroke in conditions such as acute coronary syndrome peripheral artery disease and after a recent heart attack or stroke

Name: Levofloxacin
Description: Fluoroquinolone antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections such as respiratory infections skin infections urinary tract infections and prostate infections

Name: Cephalexin
Description: Cephalosporin antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections such as respiratory tract infections skin infections ear infections and urinary tract infections

Name: Naproxen
Description: Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to reduce pain inflammation and fever

Name: Fluconazole
Description: Antifungal medication used to treat fungal infections such as yeast infections of the mouth throat esophagus abdomen lungs blood and other organs

Name: Hydrocodone
Description: Opioid analgesic used to treat moderate to severe pain

Name: Oxycodone
Description: Opioid analgesic used to treat moderate to severe pain

Name: Alprazolam
Description: Benzodiazepine used to treat anxiety and panic disorders

Name: Tramadol
Description: Opioid analgesic used to treat moderate to severe pain

Name: Doxycycline
Description: Tetracycline antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections such as acne urinary tract infections and chlamydia

Name: Lorazepam
Description: Benzodiazepine used to treat anxiety disorders insomnia and seizures

Name: Furosemide
Description: Loop diuretic used to treat fluid retention (edema) and high blood pressure

Name: Omeprazole
Description: Proton pump inhibitor (PPI) used to reduce stomach acid and treat conditions like heartburn acid reflux and ulcers

Name: Simvastatin
Description: Statin medication used to lower cholesterol levels in the blood and reduce the risk of heart disease and stroke

Name: Metformin
Description: Oral diabetes medicine used to control blood sugar levels in people with type 2 diabetes

Name: Lisinopril
Description: Angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitor used to treat high blood pressure heart failure and to improve survival after a heart attack

Name: Atorvastatin
Description: Statin medication used to lower cholesterol levels in the blood and reduce the risk of heart disease and stroke

Name: Metoprolol
Description: Beta-blocker used to treat high blood pressure chest pain (angina) heart failure and to improve survival after a heart attack

Name: Levothyroxine
Description: Thyroid hormone used to treat an underactive thyroid (hypothyroidism)

Name: Losartan
Description: Angiotensin II receptor blocker (ARB) used to treat high blood pressure and to reduce the risk of stroke in patients with hypertension and left ventricular hypertrophy

Name: Amlodipine
Description: Calcium channel blocker used to treat high blood pressure and chest pain (angina)

Name: Montelukast
Description: Leukotriene receptor antagonist used to prevent asthma and to treat seasonal allergies

Name: Fluticasone
Description: Corticosteroid used to treat asthma allergic rhinitis and nasal polyps

Name: Ranitidine
Description: H2 blocker used to reduce stomach acid and treat conditions like heartburn acid reflux and ulcers

Name: Eszopiclone
Description: Nonbenzodiazepine sedative-hypnotic used to treat insomnia

Name: Gabapentin

Name: Insulin
Description: Hormone used to treat diabetes by controlling blood sugar levels

Description: Atypical antipsychotic used to treat schizophrenia bipolar disorder major depressive disorder and irritability associated with autism
